about_the_game:
One Last Chance

You are a fugitive, on the run. As part of a horrific technical accident at work, you accidentally temporarily caused the entire internet to crash for everyone on Earth. As a wanted man you have fled to the remote island town of Lusty Shores. Your childhood friend Mira lives there, and is willing to take you in, help you hide, and give you a fresh start.

Mira is overwhelmed with her work as the world's most popular E-Girl. She gives you an opportunity to rebuild your life as her personal assistant.

Discover the magic of Lusty Shores. Meet and seduce the beautiful women. Make something of yourself. But never forget that your true identity must remain a secret. Keep one eye over your shoulder. Not everything is as it seems.

Features

  • Meet and seduce three gorgeous women!

  • Build up their trust and consent over time. Until they are completely free use!

  • Full English voiceover for all the women!

  • All sex scenes are fully animated and interactive!

  • Real time physics for all the jiggly parts!

  • Strip them and feel them up mid conversation!

Mira: Your lifelong friend with a heart of gold.

Juliette: Your voluptuous and seductive manager.

Eloise: The ambitious and spunky go-getter.

content_descriptors.notes: Lusty Shores features animated interactive sex scenes involving one to four characters. All characters are clearly consenting and enthusiastic adults.

name: Lusty Shores

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Explore the beautiful town of Lusty Shores. Seduce the beautiful women that live there. Rebuild your life. And become the man you were always meant to be.
